      • getAccountFor

        public Account getAccountFor(java.lang.String userId)
        Retrieves the account in the servers known accounts that corresponds to a user id.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user id to match with
        Returns:
        Account The account associated with the provided user id or, if not found, null.

      • addAccount

        public void addAccount(Account a)
        Adds an account to the servers known users.
        Parameters:
        a - The account to add.

      • removeAccount

        public void removeAccount(Account a)
        Removes an account from the servers known users.
        Parameters:

      • getAccounts

        public java.util.Set<Account> getAccounts()
        Retrives all accounts known to the server.
        Returns:
        Set Set containing the servers known users.

      • getNewFriendPosts

        public java.util.List<Post> getNewFriendPosts(Account account)
        Retrives all posts made by friends of a certain user since the last sync.
        Parameters:
        account - The user asking for the new posts.
        Returns:
        List List of new posts made by friends

      • getNewPosts

        public java.util.List<Post> getNewPosts(Account account)
        Retrives all posts made since the last sync between the server and a certain user.
        Parameters:
        account - The user asking for the new posts.
        Returns:
        List List of new posts made by friends of the asking user.

      • getPosts

        public java.util.List<Post> getPosts()
        Retrives all posts ever made.
        Returns:
        List List of all posts made to the server.

      • addPost

        public void addPost(Post p)
        Adds a post to the servers list of posts.
        Parameters:
        p - The post to add

      • addPostAction

        public void addPostAction(PostAction p)
        Adds a PostAction, containing a comment or a like, to the servers list of PostActions.
        Parameters:
        p - The PostAction object to add.
